uvi.description:
watchdog: sc520_wdt: Fix possible use-after-free in wdt_turnoff()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.134 by commit 7c56c5508dc20a6b133bc669fc34327a6711c24c. For more details please see the references link.
